channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Osama Sakhi

item.title: I Left My Job to Teach High-Schoolers at a Summer Camp, Here's What I Learned
item.description: In Summer 2018, I became an Instructor for two courses offered by Duke TIP: Applications, Algorithms, Computers: Modern Programming @ Rice University Artificial Intelligence @ Georgia Tech Through this experience, I learned to design courses end-to-end, including crafting syllabi, conducting lectures, creating assignments, & engaging in parent-teacher conferences.
